pr_title: Initial commit of mapper.geo.fence, added constants for geo mappers

timeline.message: Initial commit of mapper.geo.fence, added constants for geo mappers

timeline.bodyText:
The comment does not match the code.
On top of that, I'm not sure returning false for GeoTimeSerie.NO_LOCATION is what most users expect. I'd rather return null for no location.
timeline.author: ftence
ftence
